name: Beany Pop
description:
Pop as many grumpy Beanyes into happy ones before the time runs out. Use whirlpools to your advantage to avoid drowning in Beanyes.

Made for Quarantine Jam  with a theme: "A lot of.."

Team:
  • Nani (Game Design, Art)
  • Antti Koponen (Technical Design, Programming, Sound Design, Animation)
Tools:
  • Unity
  • Krita
  • Audacity
Assets:
  • Font: Hey august by Khurasan
  • Font: Messy Fika by Viktor Örneland
  • Music: Chibi Ninja by Eric Skiff
